line_1: Whate'er of Greece in sculptur'd brass survives,
line_2: Whate'er of Genius on the canvass lives,

line_1: And scarce a Trace of Youth in Age survives:
line_2: With rapid Haste Old Time the Moments drives;

line_1: Not so the Fire-Flair's Dart; that still survives
line_2: The dying Fish, and in it's Venom lives.
Still warm in youth immortal lives;

line_1: Still thy meek spirit in thy flock survives,
line_2: Consistent still, their doctrines rule their lives;
